Text:
Thanks ozki01 !   A super-fast download for a 'hot' author.  I'll read this after i digest the new James Rollins.  My only complaint:  the format makes it tough to stop reading and start up again.

If anyone out there has more, though, please upload them !  Thrillers and horror are good to carry around in my notebook.

no prob...btw, its the only format i could find, i'll post a lit when i come across it. 

i normally just convert it all to .txt and read them on my mobile. ofcource that only works with some books, but it sure beats carrying a laptop around :)
